Product Development+Design+Interior Desi.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of interior designs that receive approval from stakeholders.
Product Development+Design+Interior Desi.FORMULA: (Number of Approved Interior Designs / Total Interior Designs) * 100

Product Development+Design+Interior Desi.KPIS: Time to Market for Interior Designs
Product Development+Design+Interior Desi.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time from the initial concept of interior designs to market launch.
Product Development+Design+Interior Desi.FORMULA: Total Time from Interior Design Completion to Market Launch

Product Development+Design+Interior Desi.EXPLANATION: Evaluates the quality of interior designs based on various quality criteria.
Product Development+Design+Interior Desi.FORMULA: Average Quality Rating of Interior Designs

Product Development+Design+Interior Desi.EXPLANATION: Measures how well the actual costs for interior design adhere to the budgeted costs.
Product Development+Design+Interior Desi.FORMULA: (Actual Cost for Interior Design / Budgeted Cost for Interior Design) * 100

Product Development+Design+Interior Desi.EXPLANATION: Measures the average customer satisfaction score for interior designs.
Product Development+Design+Interior Desi.FORMULA: (Sum of Customer Feedback Ratings on Interior Design / Number of Customers)

Product Development+Design+Interior Desi.EXPLANATION: Assesses the level of innovation in interior designs.
Measures the number of iterations a design undergoes before final approval.
Measures the efficiency of material usage in design processes.
